sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE160510 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , FREE_DTY_REDU_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_REDU_AGGR_SUM , CURR_PAE_WORK_PAYRFG_SUM , PRCSP_PAYRFG_SUM , FREETY_REDU_TX_CHNG_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum# , #freeDtyReduDivCd# , #freeDtyReduAggrSum# , #currPaeWorkPayrfgSum# , #prcspPayrfgSum# , #freetyReduTxChngSum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE160510 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum# , FREE_DTY_REDU_DIV_CD=#freeDtyReduDivCd# , FREE_DTY_REDU_AGGR_SUM=#freeDtyReduAggrSum# , CURR_PAE_WORK_PAYRFG_SUM=#currPaeWorkPayrfgSum# , PRCSP_PAYRFG_SUM=#prcspPayrfgSum# , FREETY_REDU_TX_CHNG_SUM=#freetyReduTxChngSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE160510 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , FREE_DTY_REDU_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_REDU_AGGR_SUM , CURR_PAE_WORK_PAYRFG_SUM , PRCSP_PAYRFG_SUM , FREETY_REDU_TX_CHNG_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160510 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , FREE_DTY_REDU_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_REDU_AGGR_SUM , CURR_PAE_WORK_PAYRFG_SUM , PRCSP_PAYRFG_SUM , FREETY_REDU_TX_CHNG_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160510 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE160510 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
